page.title: 05ST FELIX CHURCH, FELIXKIRK
page.content: This is one of eight churches and two other places of worship in the Hillside Parishes. The priest in charge is the vicar of Knayton. At Felixkirk there are 57 people on the electoral roll. Holy Communion is celebrated on the 1st and 3rd Sundays in the month at 9.15am.Festival Evensong is held on special occasions such as Harvest time and St Felix day. There is a movement abroad for the Hillside Parishes to enter into the Eccumenical Project with the Methodist Church, whereby the Anglican churches and the Methodist chapels retained, would become shared buildings, thus having one shared place of worship in each village, but this has not yet been approved officially.
